thread.title: ExcelR crosses 400 employee strength - celebrates in unity! - IssueWire
thread.title_full: ExcelR crosses 400 employee strength - celebrates in unity! - IssueWire

author: ExcelR - Data Science, Data Analytics and Business Analyst Course Training in Hyderabad
title: ExcelR crosses 400 employee strength - celebrates in unity! - IssueWire
text:
Hyderabad, Telangana Dec 30, 2023 ( Issuewire.com ) - ExcelR, a distinguished training institute nestled at Cyber Towers, proudly announces its significant milestone of surpassing 400 employees. Renowned for a diverse spectrum of instructor-led programs including Data Science, PMP, Business Analytics, DevOps, AWS, and more, its comprehensive Data Analytics Course in Hyderabad stands out as a flagship offering of ExcelR.
Boasting a decade of experience, ExcelR has become a pivotal institution for aspiring freshers and working professionals in Hyderabad, offering both classroom and live virtual training modes of training. Despite its training focus, the workplace atmosphere resonates with an IT setup, creating an engaging and dynamic environment for its employees, as attested by Ms. Tejaswini, a recent addition to ExcelRâ€™s Hyderabad campus.
The celebration of this remarkable achievement took the form of a joyous cake-cutting ceremony, symbolizing the unity and collaborative spirit that propels ExcelR forward.
At the event, the Human Resources head highlighted the intensive efforts invested in reaching the 400-employee milestone. In just six months, the employee count surged from 300 to 400, a testament to ExcelR's commitment to growth. The onboarding process, characterized by meticulous training and knowledge transfer, ensured a seamless integration of the highly qualified new team members.
Acknowledging the pivotal role of human resources in organizational success, Mr. Ram Tavva, the MD and CEO of ExcelR, expressed his elation at witnessing the organization's rapid expansion. Welcoming the new team members, he assured them of an inclusive and empowering work environment. Mr. Tavva emphasized that the aggressive hiring strategy aligns with ExcelR's strategic vision, ensuring sustained growth and excellence.
ExcelR's journey from 300 to 400 employees in just six months reflects its unwavering commitment to excellence, setting new benchmarks in the realm of professional training and development. As the institution continues to flourish, it remains a beacon for aspiring professionals seeking to carve successful careers in the dynamic landscape of Hyderabad.
